fileSamples.statement: (CONS : WCore.is_cons G_t) (SUB : sub_execution G_t G_s sc_t sc_s) : irreflexive (hb_s ⨾ eco_s^?).
(CONS : WCore.is_cons G_t) (SUB : sub_execution G_t G_s sc_t sc_s) : irreflexive (hb_t ⨾ eco_t^?).
(CONS : WCore.is_cons G_t) (SUB : sub_execution G_t G_s sc_t sc_s) : rmw_s ∩ (fr_s ⨾ co_s) ≡ ∅₂.
fileSamples.proofString:
split; [| basic_solver].
rewrite (sub_rmw_in SUB), (sub_fr_in SUB),          (sub_co_in SUB).
apply CONS.

fileSamples.statement: (CONS : WCore.is_cons G_t) (SUB : sub_execution G_t G_s sc_t sc_s) : rmw_t ∩ (fr_t ⨾ co_t) ⊆ ∅₂.
